text: Isabelle Anne Madeleine Huppert (born March 16, 1953) is a French actress. She is known for her roles in Violette Nozi√®re, La pianist, and in Amour. Huppert was born on March 16, 1953 in Paris, France. She as raised in Ville-d'Avray. Huppert studied at National Conservatory of Dramatic Art of Paris. She was married to Ronald Chammah since 1982. They had three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Isabelle Huppert at filmsdefrance.com Category:Satellite Award winners Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris
